level.heading: EMERGENCY MEDICAL SERVICE EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION CERTIFICATION COURSE STANDARDS§ 29-544)

level.text: A District certified EMS educational institution that desires to offer an EMS certification course in the District shall:
Meet the current national standards and NREMT standards for the certification level being taught;
Submit an application signed by the institution’s medical director requesting approval of each certification course as outlined in § 543; and
Submit a separate application for each course provided.
Certification courses shall utilize the appropriate NREMT practical skill certification exam. The practical skill exams shall be:
Administered by the NREMT when required under NREMT certification standards; or
Administered in accordance with current District policy, when administration of the exam by the NREMT is not required under NREMT certification standards.
